txt.en: You have burned the tombs of the dead in Wódscrafen. Hopefully, this will be enough to ensure that they do not return to trouble the living.
The cave smells of old death, dry and acrid. The dead walk here, and their tombs lie open. They should be burned so that the draug will not be allowed to trouble the living again.
You have burned the tombs of the dead in Wódscrafen. Hopefully, this will be enough to ensure that they do not return to trouble the living.
Wódscrafen is full of draug woken from death to walk again and trouble the living. Their tombs should be burned so that they can never wake again after you lay them to rest.
Tombs of the draug can surely be found in Wódscrafen.\n\nYou should burn the tombs of the draug.
Tombs of the draug can surely be found in Wódscrafen.\n\nYou should burn the tombs of the draug.
